attributes.action: Ban Battery Chicken Farming in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Personally every animal or being on this planet is entitled to the right to live a decent life. It does not matter whether it is one day or tens of years.

Seeing the outside world should be a given right also. Money is not everything. Would we bring our children up in these conditions. No, would we let our pets live like this, No.

We all must say STOP!!!! AND NOW !!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
